title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
While pasta cooks, fry pancetta in a large skillet over medium heat until crispy.
In a bowl, whisk eggs with grated cheeses and plenty of black pepper.
Drain pasta, reserving 1/2 cup pasta water.
Working quickly, add hot pasta to skillet with pancetta, then remove from heat.
Pour egg mixture over pasta, tossing quickly to create a creamy sauce. Add pasta water if needed.
Serve immediately with extra cheese and pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt, lemon juice, and spices for at least 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until cooked through, set aside.
In a large pan, melt butter and sauté onion until soft.
Add garlic and ginger, cook for 1 minute.
Add tomato puree and simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in cream and add cooked chicken, simmer for 5 minutes.
Garnish with cilantro and serve with rice or naan.

title: Classic Burger
summary: Juicy beef patty with lettuce, tomato, onion, and special sauce on a sesame seed bun.
ingredients: For the sauce: 1/2 cup mayo, 2 tbsp ketchup, 1 tbsp mustard, 1 tsp pickle relish
instructions: Divide beef into 4 patties, season with salt and pepper.
Grill or pan-fry patties for 3-4 minutes per side.
Add cheese in last minute of cooking.
Toast buns lightly.
Mix sauce ingredients together.
Assemble burgers: bottom bun, sauce, lettuce, patty, tomato, onion, top bun.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: Crisp romaine lettuce, parmesan cheese, croutons, and creamy Caesar dressing.
ingredients: For the dressing: 2 anchovy fillets, 1 egg yolk, 2 tbsp lemon juice, 1 tsp Dijon mustard, 1 clove garlic, 1/2 cup olive oil, salt and pepper
instructions: Wash and dry lettuce, tear into bite-sized pieces.
For dressing: mash anchovies with garlic, whisk in egg yolk, mustard, lemon juice.
Slowly drizzle olive oil while whisking continuously.
Season with salt and pepper.
Toss lettuce with dressing, top with parmesan and croutons.

title: Margherita Pizza
summary: Traditional Neapolitan pizza with tomatoes, mozzarella, fresh basil, salt, and olive oil.
instructions: Preheat oven to 250°C with pizza stone if available.
Roll out pizza dough.
Spread tomato sauce evenly, leaving border for crust.
Arrange mozzarella slices.
Bake for 10-12 minutes until crust is golden.
Top with fresh basil, drizzle with olive oil.

title: Chocolate Lava Cake
summary: Rich chocolate cake with a molten chocolate center, served with vanilla ice cream.
instructions: Preheat oven to 200°C. Butter ramekins.
Melt chocolate and butter together in double boiler.
Beat eggs with sugar until pale and fluffy.
Fold in chocolate mixture, then flour and salt.
Fill ramekins and bake for 12 minutes.
Let rest 1 minute, then invert onto plates.
Serve immediately with ice cream.
